content: I don't have personal opinions or beliefs, but i can provide factual information. unfortunately, you didn't mention which specific festival you are referring to in lower saxony. lower saxony is a state in northwestern germany, and it has many local festivals throughout the year that have different cultural and historical backgrounds. the costumes worn during festivals in lower saxony often reflect the local traditions and customs of the region. for example, during the schützenfest festival, which is popular in lower saxony, people wear traditional garments from the 18th and 19th centuries, such as frock coats, top hats, and sashes. these costumes symbolize the historical roots of the festival, which was originally a celebration of military marksmanship. overall, the costumes worn during festivals in lower saxony are an important way of preserving and honoring the cultural heritage of the region.
